channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Visible Promo Code: Save Up to $400 in June 2025
item.description: Find great deals and promo codes for Visible at WIRED and save big, whether you're a long-time customer or a newbie.

item.title: Elon Musk is lobbying lawmakers on driverless vehicle rules
item.description: Musk and others in his orbit have been calling members of Congress directly, according to Bloomberg.

item.title: A Hacker May Have Deepfaked Trump’s Chief of Staff in a Phishing Campaign
item.description: Plus: An Iranian man pleads guilty to a Baltimore ransomware attack, Russia’s nuclear blueprints get leaked, a Texas sheriff uses license plate reader...

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: A ride-sharing pioneer comes for Uber, Tesla loses more ground, and dog-like delivery robots land in Texas
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: It’s not your imagination: AI is speeding up the pace of change
item.description: Venture capitalist Mary Meeker just dropped a 340-page report to describe the speed at which AI is being developed, adopted, spent on, and used.

item.title: Yep, X was down again
item.description: People reported that photos weren't loading, its banking service XMoney wasn't working, and search wasn't returning any results, among other things.

item.title: DOGE Is Busier Than Ever—and Trump Says Elon Musk Is 'Really Not Leaving'
item.description: Federal workers from six agencies tell WIRED that DOGE-style work is escalating in their departments as both new and familiar DOGE faces have appeared...

item.title: DOGE left United States Institute of Peace office with water damage, rats, and roaches
item.description: The chief executive of the United States Institute of Peace (USIP) says Elon Musk's DOGE left the nonprofit's Washington, D.C., headquarters in disarr...

item.title: Best iPad Accessories (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These are some of our favorite stands, cases, keyboards, and styli, no matter which Apple tablet you have.

item.title: Republican Operatives Want to Distance Themselves From Elon Musk's DOGE
item.description: “People agree with what he’s trying to do. But some people just need a villain,” a source tells WIRED.
